titleStmt.title: Untimely repentance a sermon preach'd before the right honourable Lord Petre in his chappel at Ingatestone-hall on Passion Sunday, April the 1st, 1688 / by Richard Levison P. of the Society of Jesus.
titleStmt.author: Levison, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
